html:
11.3.18  6:41 pm   I am humbly grateful for your uploads every two weeks, even surprising me ahead of schedule; honestly, I wasn't expecting long, long, long, journey until Thursday or Friday. This one has been my morning alarm and have given me wings each time I listen to it.

I think I'm on that "high" that you have been talking about in your older songs and it's a great adventure and I don't want it to stop!!

If you had to give this era of awakening of incredible music a name, what would you give it? The Kiss of Time, A Slice of Life, Electric Euphoria Overload, Mountain of Love or just putting out songs is just enough to be thankful for?   

     i would probably call it the 2 week song schedule

11.3.18  6:34 pm   Do you think you have to sacrifice originality and innovation for speed?

     no way, speed will usually trigger those things in a perhaps more powerful way than if speed were not a factor

11.3.18  6:09 pm   why does the north pole not show on a map

     i think if you turn on the longitude lines you should see it pretty easily

11.3.18  5:50 pm   how is it, being human?

     it's ok

11.3.18  5:49 pm   In Mount saint Helens is about to blow up you sing "and the people who work in my office went on vacation cous they say i haven't been paying them very much anymore". How can the people who work in you're office afford to go on vacation with so little pay? 

     that is hopefully what gives the story a sense of intrigue at that point

11.3.18  4:35 pm   Do you plan to make any songs in a different language?

     yes

11.3.18  4:17 pm   How do I find my creative passions ?

     do 10 things and see which you like the most .... then do 10 more things and see which you like most .... you may start noticing some patterns at this point

11.3.18  3:27 pm   does that podcast line in long long long journey have anything to do with the podcast you're going on?

     it was not supposed to, but looking back i suppose it is difficult to deny the influence

11.3.18  3:08 pm   What is the long long story in long long long journey

     any story that can be told

11.3.18  2:47 pm   Do you have any merchandise? I want to give you money. It will give me happiness

     you can give money here or you can get merch here but in the case of merch the money would mostly not go to me. or maybe half of it would? not really sure. but if your objective is to give me money then this is definitely your best bet

11.3.18  2:26 pm   How important are the visual aspects of your work ? I discovered you with one or two videos, but I listen to all of your songs now on Spotify. Do you think my experience of your work is hindered ? 

     no but it would have been if i didn't make the visuals

11.3.18  2:25 pm   what font did you use on the hill in "long long long journey"?

     i don't remember

11.3.18  2:18 pm   In "Long Long Long Journey", is the main rhythm in the verses ("down to the coast guard to see what they're") comprised of triplet groups or groups of two dotted eighth notes and an eighth note?

     some lyrics were sung each way. 'see what they're' seems to be sung as pretty even triplets. where as the first line of the song seems to be dotted eighth, etc.

11.3.18  2:05 pm   Josh Turner here, I did the "And the day goes on" cover. If i may be so bold - want to grab a beer some time?

     perhaps not a beer per se, but i would like to talk with you. if this is the real you, could you please email me? billwurtz at billwurtz dot com. thanks!

11.3.18  1:09 pm   Christmas falls on a Tuesday this year..  do you think that your song release for that day will be a christmas song, or will you just sprinkle some christmassy images into the video?

     christmas/holiday related material is usually not released on christmas day, because that day is just about the end of the christmas season. most christmas/holiday material is released much earlier. if i have any material of that kind it will certainly be released on either 12/11 or 11/27

11.3.18  12:48 pm   i can't figure out how to eat. can you give me some help please?

     your local library surely must have some great literature on the subject

11.3.18  12:26 pm   How do you make transitioning into odd time signatures sound natural (like in "I'm Best Friends with my own Front Door when you go to 7/4)?

     the dropped beat was dropped out of necessity, to get to the next line sooner. it's like making a mop closet slightly smaller to fit a small mop. the mop may make the closet seem natural, but in reality it was the closet that was re-sized to more naturally fit the mop, if that makes sense

11.3.18  12:15 pm   how do you make such good good bops

     a good technique i use is, make a blop then take out the l

11.3.18  12:08 pm   When you say "I wonder if it seems ok" are you talking about you wondering whether or not people will like your music?  Or if its about me its about me wondering if people will like what I have done?   Or is it something else?

     i think it was refering to the rain references from just before

11.3.18  11:50 am   what's your favorite type of hat?

     bent

11.3.18  11:10 am   is the moon made of cheese

     no

11.3.18  10:23 am   Do you ever imagine yourself performing a new song in front of an audience to gauge whether it's really good or not?

     not for that reason

11.3.18  10:22 am   What is the coast guard guarding the coast from?

     unregistered ghosts

11.3.18  9:48 am   How strong is the "long long strong way" at the end of the new song?

     let's say about a 7

      Would it do better in the strength test in I'm Best Friends With My Own Front Door than you did?

     i thought that was you

      Perhaps a better questions is can a 'way' even be strong?

     yes

11.3.18  9:26 am   how did the trees get so big

     the world around them got smaller

11.3.18  8:03 am   can you make bloopers

     sure. here's one to get you started, and here's another one

11.3.18  5:06 am   vacuum is spelled with a W.

     that's almost true

11.3.18  2:12 am   what is special?

     deleted scenes which you can still watch somehow despite having been deleted

11.3.18  1:41 am   Is the part in "long long long journey" about the coast gaurd a referance to some of the stupid/ obvious questions people ask you?

     no

11.3.18  12:20 am   Where do I go to buy happiness with money?

     the bank, or perhaps a landfill

11.3.18  12:06 am   Peanuts or toasters?

     i wonder if you could combine the 2 some how

11.2.18  11:59 pm   Which is better: rubber bands or empty soda cans?

     are you allowed to combine them

11.2.18  11:57 pm   What do you have against ending punctuation?

     redundancy

11.2.18  11:55 pm   Why does my Internet suck tonight?

     to encourage you to pay more for your next internet package

11.2.18  11:15 pm   *paparazzi voice" bill wurtz, Ethan Klein just confirmed that you have accepted to be on his H3 podcast. This is unprecedented for you, what are you thinking and feeling right now?

     i actually already knew about it

      Are you entering a new personal era?

     i entered the current era about 10 weeks ago

      What can we expect next?

     songs

11.2.18  10:07 pm   how to climb a mountain

     try to push the mountain lower so that you are higher in comparison

11.2.18  9:36 pm   What's been on your mind lately?

     knowledge as well as other various informational data figures

11.2.18  9:01 pm   How do I decide what to eat?

     you could eat cannibals. that would turn the tables on them

11.2.18  8:32 pm   it's my birthday in a few years, will you make content?

     sure

11.2.18  8:08 pm   do you like sports?

     i am sports

11.2.18  7:59 pm   hey bill your stuff has been great recently! i was wondering if you're planing on writing a christmas song when the time comes. i think it would go well with your style.

     i will do it

11.2.18  7:26 pm   What is the most important thing to you?

     potions / elixirs

11.2.18  6:04 pm   Is there an end goal?

     reach the beginning

      Do you feel like you're working towards some ultimate aspiration?

     yes

      Or is life just unending creative suffering? 

     the suffering ends and then starts again

11.2.18  5:53 pm   what is your favourite regular polyhedron?

     sphere, or should i say, almost sphere

11.2.18  4:35 pm   how do you feel about sheet music?

     ok

      is it completely necessary?

     useful sometimes

11.2.18  3:49 pm   which us state has the sexiest outline?

     wyoming

11.2.18  3:32 pm   How do I redefine my legacy?

     1 step at a time

11.2.18  2:47 pm   What are your opinions on science fairs?

     rigged

11.2.18  2:12 pm   you said an "edit with me" style video might have personal issues with it, i'm not exactly sure what kind of personal issue you might have with that, can you further explain?

     11.1.18  8:12 am

11.2.18  1:40 pm   Do u think its all a simulation/were in a coma? If yes, how/when are we gonna wake up?

     it's a simulated coma
